name: Scott Miller
bio: Been learning to love JavaScript more and more over the last few years. Just trying to keep learning an help others.

name: Christoph Lipp
bio: What can I say... it's Javascript alright :) I try to avoid pure JS as much as I can. But, it's the language of the web and the more you know about its many pitfalls the better :)

name: Sean Fairchild
bio: I'm a senior Ruby dev professionally at my company. I have also worked a lot with JavaScript and most recently lead a team building a React app for one of our clients.

name: Shannon Tjoa
bio: I love JavaScript for its dynamic nature. I have been using it for my professional work and personal projects
